subject: N. 3064074188338547
description_text:
I need an invoice that shows ONLY the price of the motors in order to pay customs for a product worth 100€, because the invoice you provided includes the price of the pedals, and I already have those at home without going through customs.

If you can list a lower amount, I will recommend you to my sim racing followers

Enviado desde mi iPhone

conversations.body_text:
